title: Spyder Auto Installation: 2002-2006 Chevrolet Avalanche LED Tail Lights
description: This video features a walkthrough of how to install a set of Spyder Auto LED tail lights on 2002-06 Chevrolet Avalanche crossover truck. This video will guide you through the process of how to install the tail lights, connect the inserts and offers other helpful tips throughout to facilitate a successful installation.
tags: Spyder LED Tail Lights, LED lights, how to install, Chevy Avalanche, Chevrolet Avalanche, spyder lights
